features.title: TasksList fixes
features.description:
Allow sorting of tasks and display them in reverse to begin with.
The status dropdown should be the same as the one StatusControl uses.
The search box needs to be bigger and the Clear button only showing if searching. This can just be a (x) icon at the end of the search input.

features.title: The Tooltip for DependencyBullet should show close to the center of the screen
features.description:
In many cases when the DependencyBullet is close to the right or bottom edge, the tooltip it shows gets cut off by the window end.
Whenever the tooltip is close to an edge - it should offset in the opposite direction.

features.title: ChatView errors
features.description:
When opening ChatView - there's an error:

validateDOMNesting(...): <button> cannot appear as a descendant of <button>.
    at button
    at span
    at button
    at li
    at ul
    at nav
    at aside
    at SidebarContent (http://localhost:5173/src/renderer/components/ui/CollapsibleSidebar.tsx:50:40)

features.title: Board view fixes
features.description: Fix clicking. Only drag works - not even key press does.

features.title: TaskService should be the only interface for task related ops
features.description: Currently TasksIndex (TasksIndexSnapshot) is exposed as well as dependencyResolver. These should not be available outside of the TaskService - this service should be the only interface for handling tasks.

features.title: TaskService should be used only for task related ops
features.description: All references to task ops must go through TaskService. All involved files are in the context.

features.title: ChatsManager follows TasksManager
features.description: TasksManager has this nice separation of its storage into a separate reusable class TasksStorage. ChatsManager should follow the same pattern.
